title: Terrible ISP
body: Anyone who thinks they have terrible internet, you obviously have never experienced Frontier Communications. Hands down the worst ISP to ever exist. I PEAK AT 1.1 MB download speed. my ping in league is at a constant 126 which is almost unplayable. And their customer support is downright awful, i stayed on the phone for 3 hours trying to better my ping. so honestly dont know what to do at this point.

replies.body: Aw man that really sucks to hear =\ . We could try adjusting your port forwarding and DNS settings using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource if you're not sure how to update them, but if the issue really lies with your ISP there's not a whole lot you can do on your end.

i actually have frontier communications aswell, and during season 2 and 3 i couldnt connect to most of my games til around the 3 minute mark or so, and literally didnt find out it was their modem not playing nicely with league til season 4, i had tried port forwarding etc.
